modName: Sabre Cat Gear Ancient Nord Armor Variations Add-on
summary: This mod adds craftable standalone Snow and Puma versions of the Ancient Nord Armor cuirass in the style and purpose of the Sabre Cat Gear pack. Happy Hunting!
descriptionHtml:
[b]===>>> SABRE CAT GEAR <<<=== Ancient Nord Armor Variations Add-on![/b]
---> presented by DVAted <---

With the assistance of:
[i]TreasureChest (aka OG-Jay) and rahman530[/i]

[URL=http://www.imagebam.com/image/c90c02177522597][IMG]http://thumbnails67.imagebam.com/17753/c90c02177522597.jpg[/IMG][/URL] [URL=http://www.imagebam.com/image/82c43e178001568][IMG]http://thumbnails58.imagebam.com/17801/82c43e178001568.jpg[/IMG][/URL] [URL=http://www.imagebam.com/image/28df04178001572][IMG]http://thumbnails52.imagebam.com/17801/28df04178001572.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
________
Description:

This mod add-on aims to add standalone [b]Snow and Puma versions[/b] of the Ancient Nord Armor cuirass.
It\'s been optimized for both male and female characters.

This mod was created in the style and purpose of the [url=file.php?id=12583][b]Sabre Cat Gear Mod Pack[/b][/url]

Therefore, it will require a snow sabre cat pelt to craft the snow armor, 
and some charcoal sticks to create the puma version. 
The base ingredient is a normal cuirass of Ancient Nord Armor.
You can acquire the normal armor: 

a. in Forelhost during the quest \"Siege on the Dragon Cult\". The armor is dropped by the ghosts of the Dragon Cult who appear as transparent Draugr (Ancient Nords). After killing one, you will need to search the ash pile for the armor set.

b. on the ghost encountered at Kjenstag Ruins during 8:00 PM and 4:00 AM.

c. by crafting it at the Skyforge. In order to craft it you need to have finished the Companions questline, then speak to Eorlund Gray-Mane, he will speak about Kodlak\'s spirit being infused with the Skyforge. Strangely, originally, the option to craft the armor will show up in the \"Daedric\" smithing subsection. I included alternative .esps that fix this problem by moving all Ancient Nord Armor pieces in the Draugr section of the Skyforge menu.

The Snow and Black variations are under the Draugr Section and can be crafted at any forge.

________

There are 4 different .esp\'s - [b][u]USE ONLY ONE[/u][/b]
For vanilla armor model versions:
1. The one entitled:
[b]SabrecatGear_AncientArmorVs.esp[/b]
- Adds the two new colors variations.

2. The one entitled:
[b]SabrecatGear_AncientArmorVs_wFix.esp[/b]
- Adds the two new colors variations.
- Ancient Nord Armor moved from Daedric to Draugr Skyforge category.

For modded armor models:
3. The one entitled:
[b]SabrecatGear_AncientVs_wPants.esp[/b]
- Adds the two new colors variations.
- Works only for [url=file.php?id=4486]\"Ancient Nord Armor IMPROVED\" by rahman530[/url]
because it\'s the version that DVAted uses right now.
You need to download rahman\'s files for this .esp to work.

4. The one entitled:
[b]SabrecatGear_AncientVs_wPants_wFix.esp[/b]
- Adds the two new colors variations.
- Ancient Nord Armor moved from Daedric to Draugr Skyforge category.
- Works only for \"Ancient Nord Armor IMPROVED\" by rahman530. 
You need rahman\'s files for a correct display of this mod.

[i]Attention: This release does not include the meshes from rahman530\'s mod, you will have to download his files if you hadn\'t already and if you want them to work. 
Attention: Use only ONE .esp of your choice![/i]

The new textures were made by DVAted.

That\'s pretty much it!

We hope you enjoy your new custom armors that match with your sabre cat hoods, boots and gauntlets from the [url=file.php?id=12583]Sabre Cat Gear Mod Pack[/url] and with the  [url=file.php?id=13687]Sabre Gear Backpacks[/url]

_________________
_________________

Archive contents of the mod:

SabrecatGear_AncientArmorVs.esp
SabrecatGear_AncientArmorVs_wFix.esp
SabrecatGear_AncientVs_wPants.esp
SabrecatGear_AncientVs_wPants_wFix.esp
[i]*(choose only one)[/i]

Textures\\Armor\\SaberCat Gear\\Armor\\AncientNordArmor\\femaledraugrarmorblack.dds
Textures\\Armor\\SaberCat Gear\\Armor\\AncientNordArmor\\femaledraugrarmorsnow.dds
Textures\\Armor\\SaberCat Gear\\Armor\\AncientNordArmor\\maledraugrarmorblack.dds
Textures\\Armor\\SaberCat Gear\\Armor\\AncientNordArmor\\maledraugrarmorSnow.dds

_________________

- New ingame contents of the mod:
Ancient Nord Puma Armor
Ancient Nord Snow Armor

- The _wFix.esp\'s have altered the forge material entry for the following vanilla items:
Ancient Nord Armor
Ancient Nord Boots
Ancient Nord Gauntlets
Ancient Nord Helmet

_________________
_________________

Installation:
Place the Textures folder and .esp file of choice that came with this mod in your Skyrim\'s Data Folder
When prompted to replace the Texture folder click \"Yes\"

_________________

Uninstallation:
Remove the files of this mod from your Skyrim\'s Data Folder

_________________

Bugs, Requirements and Conflicts:
No Bugs!

1. For the first .esp - NO Requirements so far! Might conflict with mods that alter the Ancient Nord Armor
2. For the second .esp (_wFix) - NO Requirements so far! Might conflict with other mods that alter the Ancient Nord Armor.
3. For the third .esp (_wPants) - Requires: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4486 for the meshes. Might conflict with any other mods that alter the Ancient Nord Armor.
4. For the fourth .esp (_wPants_wFix) - Requires: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4486 for the meshes. Might conflict with any other mods that alter the Ancient Nord Armor.


Feel free to report bugs and post suggestions. 
If you don\'t like something, please provide constructive criticism. 
If you don\'t like anything, please keep your thoughts to yourself.

_________________

Disclaimer:
Do not upload this mod anywhere without specific permission from the authors. Do not post mediafire links on youtube videos! However, you may instead post direct links to the mod\'s release page.

Do not upload this mod on Steam Workshop. You will be reported! We will get around to post it there as well, but for now, the planned optional add-ons and updates of this mod project might interfere with the Workshop\'s auto-updating feature, so please let us clear that out first.
 
Do not use assets of this mod in your own project or release without giving credit to us. We may be very inclined to provide permission if we consider your plans worthy, so please ask us first. In any event, due credit for this mod should be considered holy. We\'ve only worked at it, blood, sweat and tears, literally FOR MONTHS. Thank you ^_^

[b]Translation releases which include just the .esp are welcomed and encouraged.[/b]

_________________

Contact:
By direct comment on the mod\'s release page!
By e-mail to DVAted, or by Skype on the ID \"alexe-arts\"
By Private Message for TreasureChest (aka OG-Jay) on Nexus Forums
author: DVAted
